name: Speed Demon (Butwhylevin)
description:
A Hotline Miami-Inspired Top Down Hack and Slash. 

You play as the Time Reaper, the lesser-known cousin of the Grim Reaper. It's your job to correct issues involving time travel and such. A large group of medieval monsters has recently time traveled to present day, and it is your job to kill them in order to correct the timeline or something. 

This is my first proper game made in Godot, it's not all that polished thanks to most of the week being spent just trying to learn the basics. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LEFT MOUSE - Attack

TAB - Restart Stage

ESC - Exit Game

Music Used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=miWN-WnQDLQ
